name: Vaccine Express
description:
In this game you have the mission to deliver vaccines across you town!

For that you will have 3 vans available. First you have to fill them up with vaccines in the cargo bay.

Once your van is filled you can drive to your destination. You can see the delivery information on the top left of your screen.

You are probably wondering if I have a map or something and the answer is no, a good delivery guy always knows is town!

Deliver as much vaccines as possible and accumulate point. You can spend your points in the Upgrade Menu and buy upgrades such as more cargo capacity and faster refills.

Controls

Keyboard and MouseControllerWalkWASD KeysLeft Stick / D-Pad
RunShiftRight ShoulderLookMouseRight StickGet In/Out VehicleENorth ButtonAcceleratorWRight TriggerBrakeSLeft TriggerSteerAD KeysLeft StickPauseEscapeStartUpgrades MenuTabSelect
